response.overview: Evandro is a new disability man that lives alone in his apartment in a rich neighborhood in Sao Paulo, Brazil. His lonely life has a deadline. Luisa, a house cleaner, came to live with him for help with the new dependent life. She brings together Francisco, her seven years old child. Evandro must to learn how to live with them. He needs Luisa. The relationship is going well till a man, Evandros friend starts to visit the house often.
response.title: Sobre Chás e Vinhos
